text: Amarelis De Mera (born 28 March 1985) is a Panamanian footballer and coach who plays as a forward for Tauro FC and the Panama women's national team. She played for the American team, Santa Clarita Blue Heat, in the USL W-League. ==References== == External links == * * * * * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Panamanian football managers Category:Panamanian women's footballers Category:Women's association football forwards Category:USL W-League players Category:UE L'Estartit players Category:Panama women's international footballers Category:Panamanian expatriate footballers Category:Panamanian expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Spain Category:Panamanian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate women's soccer players in the United States
title: Amarelis De Mera
